1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Gia Sen and Isha discuss love and relationships. Meanwhile, Revati Chauhan dreams to make it big at an international DJ competition. Diana later blackmails Gia to write some sensational news for her company in order to retain her job.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Gia gets irritated and scolds Revati for tagging her in a facebook post due to which she is facing issues at her job. Gia later reaches the police station and finds Sahir locked up inside.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Isha gets into a serious relationship with Sahir and she is proud of his commitment. Gia reaches a launch event where celebrities Azhar Khan and Saisha take part. Later, Gia begs Natasha to talk to Diana and extend the time allotted for her project.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Gia is thrilled after she gets the celebrity footage for her newspaper company as per Diana's orders. Hence, she and Revati celebrate the occasion at a pub. Meanwhile, Diana is impressed with Gia's work and promotes her.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Sahir visits Isha's house to meet her, but Gia and Revati misbehave with him. Isha wants her relationship with Sahir to be kept as a secret. Later, Gia is tensed after Azhar Khan reads her article and Isha consoles her.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Gia finds out Azhar Khan's secrets and plans to write his biography. Meanwhile. Gia feels suspicious about Isha and Sahir's relationship. However, Sahir later reveals that he wants to spend the rest of his life with Isha.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Gia apologizes to Revati for insulting her the previous night. Meanwhile, Sahir visits Isha's office and probes her about his selection for the show. But, Isha's boss removes him from the list of selected singers after seeing Isha and Sahir together.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Isha's boss removes Sahir's name from the list of singers, even though the crew is impressed with Sahir's performance and wants him to be added in the list. Later, Sahir returns to the company and Isha helps him complete his auditions.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Gia and her friends plan to sell their furniture and pay the deposit for their house. Gia later asks Diana for an advance, but Diana refuses. Isha then tells Sahir about her woes, but the latter is fuming about being kept in the dark.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Gia and friends threaten the men when they charge them extra. Azhar Khan and Gia go on a date but Nadia interrupts them midway. Later, Isha gets insulted by her boss in front of her colleagues as Sahir chose to quit the show.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Isha's boss threatens her that she might loose the job because of Sahir. Isha later confronts Sahir and asks him to return to work and Sahir agrees to it professionally. Revati confesses that she has no feelings for Guru and Guru is heart broken.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Revati tries to apologize to Guru but he ignores her, and elsewhere, Isha and Sahir are not yet ready for a compromise. Also, Diana is furious about Gia's article and later, Isha decides to patch up with Sahir after his performance.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Isha misunderstands Sahir and Megha's relationship and confronts Sahir. Futhermore, Azhar Khan and Diana surprise Gia by visiting her place. Sahir later reveals that Megha is pregnant and she is looking for a place to stay.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Megha shifts to Isha's place as per Isha's wish and creates problems for Isha and her friends. Later, Isha takes Megha to a gynecologist for consulting. Sahir then meets Isha to sort out their problems, but their egos come in between.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Sahir and Megha argue over Megha causing problems to Isha and Isha eavesdrops their conversation. Isha's boss and Sahir get into an argument regarding the rehearsal. Later, Isha regrets misunderstanding Sahir and Megha's relationship.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Megha causes problems for Isha and her friends. Sahir and Isha get into an argument regarding Sahir's attitude and Megha's issue. Sahir then questions Isha, for not believing in him. Isha later confesses about her relationship.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Isha tries to convince her friends about her relationship with Sahir. Gia and Revati are even more furious when they get to know about their affair and break up. Gia later request Diana to not inform Azhar about the article.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Gia and Revati take Isha's side and support her when Megha insults Isha. Isha and friends later warn Megha from interfering in their personal matters. Revati and Gia go after Sahir to make him understand the situation and stop him from leaving India.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Megha reluctantly decides to confess her unsuccessful love story and renounces it. Eventually, she proclaims Sahir's enamour for Isha has drastically changed him.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Gia is forced upon to take Azhar as a trainee for research of a role for his next movie. Meanwhile, Sahir is upset with Isha, for setting up a fake affair for publicity. And Revati makes Guruvinder do house chores for his chance at an apology.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: After moments of intimacy with Azhar Khan, Gia is left perplexed. Sahir's confrontation with Isha, out of his curiosity to know about his selection, leaves him infuriated when he ends up knowing that he was rejected from the show.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: The day starts off bad, as Gia's resignation gets rejected and Isha has broken up with Sahir. When she reaches her shoot she burns in jealousy on noticing Sahir get cozy with Shreya.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: Gia tries to cover Sahir's interview. Isha comes to know of this and she gets furious. Sahir and Gia argue when she tries to convince him with Isha's topic.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: The trio attends a party at which Revati is a DJ and get into a fight. The next day, they receive a bouquet of flowers from a secret admirer. Later, Isha tries to enjoy herself for being single when she gets a surprise.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Naina has found a lead to disclose Azher's secret girlfriend. Gia scared that everyone will come to know, walks into Azher's vanity van only to find Naina already there. Meanwhile, Isha and Sahir try to make each other jealous on the set.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Gia wonders how Shreya and Sahir's video got 500 likes in just 2 minutes on Youtube. Isha is upset as she faces technical difficulties in airing her show's episode.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: The girls try to cheer up Isha as her name does not appear on the credits of the show she conceptualized. They play a 'secret' version of spin the bottle and discuss the various issues of their life. But some secrets are not meant to be shared and even the girls think so.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Revati is set for her DJ audition that will get her to join Isha's crew if she wins. At the auditions, Isha, who cannot bear to see Sahir with Shreya, cries as she sees them get close.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: The DJ Hunt 2016 has everyone excited, but Isha is in tears and cannot help reminiscing about the past. It is crunch time for Revati.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: The DJ competition result is tampered with and DJ Rahul is announced the winner instead of Revati. Isha feels that the tiff with her boss has resulted in Revati's loss. Elsewhere, Sahir recollects Isha's harsh comments about his behavior.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: Shreya proposes to Sahir, leaving the star of the new TV show in an awkward position in front of the press. Later, UC shouts at him and orders him to obey his instructions. Isha is troubled and wants to quit her job.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Revati is shown a picture of Shekhar and she feels nostalgic about the times she spent with him. Later, Sahir and Isha have another fall out and both end up hurting each other.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Isha reveals how Uday manipulated the DJ hunt results and therefore, Revati gets a chance on the show. Rushali invites Azhar, Guru and Sahir to her farewell party, and the girls feel awkward facing them.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: Isha loses her temper on Sahir for cheating on her and eavesdropping on her phone call. Elsewhere, Azhar and Gia share a romantic kiss. Isha and Sahir get cozy with each other, however, they split up again later.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: Sahir goes on a binge drinking session on the road after his break up with Isha. Further, Isha's crew plays a behind the scenes video featuring Isha and Sahir getting cosy, which shocks everyone including their boss.

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: A lot of fingers are pointed at Isha and she is eventually fired from her duties by UC. She breaks down and tries to seek some solace, while Gia and Revati continue to console her.

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Isha gets fired and has to serve one month's notice period. Gia tries to remember the night with Azhar and recollects kissing him and telling him the whole truth about the secret reporter.

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: Shreya is furious and blames Sahir for spreading rumours after Isha and his intimate video goes viral. Sahir loses his temper and bashes up one of Isha's crew member.

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: Gia, Isha and Revati decide that instead of giving in, they must work towards turning the situation in their favour. Guilty, Gia goes to apologize to Azhar. Later, Diana coerces Gia to conduct the interview with Sahir and Isha.

40.title: Episode #1.40
40.plot: Having refused to give the interview, Isha is devastated to learn that she has been banned from the sets of Singing Star. After much deliberation, the interview happens and to everyone's surprise, Sahir speaks his heart out about kissing Isha.

41.title: Episode #1.41
41.plot: While Isha leaves the set feeling determined, Gia apologizes to Azhar Khan. Later, on the occasion of Mother's Day, the girls share their problems with each other. Sadly, the celebration is called off when the newspaper brings bad news for Gia.

42.title: Episode #1.42
42.plot: Sahir calls Isha to console her, as she is facing issues. Gia goes to work expecting the worst, but in turn gets baffled when Diana calls her the 'Golden girl'. Revati loses her temper on Guru when he gives her the wrong gift at the wrong time.

43.title: Episode #1.43
43.plot: The girls face a media frenzy when they bombard Gia with questions about her relationship with Azhar Khan. Later, Isha is bullied online and is devastated while reading the comments directed towards her.

44.title: Episode #1.44
44.plot: Isha, Gia and Revati are called by their society members to discuss their personal lives and the tenancy. The trio get out of this problem, thanks to their ingenious plan. Later, Revati is upset as Guru doesn't comment on the photos she sends him.

45.title: Episode #1.45
45.plot: Sahir defends Revati when UC shouts at her for mixing western beats. Later, Revati gives a surprise visit to Guru. Meanwhile, Gia tells Isha to stop watching the video. Soon after, Sahir shocks them by bringing someone covered in a Burkha.

46.title: Episode #1.46
46.plot: Gia is flustered when Azhar Khan gets down on his knees and proposes to her, however, she feels her name shouldn't be in the headlines everyday for being linked with him. Isha and Sahir wait restlessly for Gia's decision.

47.title: Episode #1.47
47.plot: The girls hide Sahir and Azhar in the bathroom when Mr. Mathew arrives suddenly. At Gia's office, Diana asks her to get an interview of Sahir and Shreya since the fans are demanding it. Later, Gia and Isha discuss the reactions from the fans.

48.title: Episode #1.48
48.plot: Revati is mocked by UC for being late. After some time, Isha too scolds her for her unprofessional attitude and storms off to check Sahir and Shreya's fan following. Later, Isha feels miserable as she watches Gia interviewing Sahir and Shreya.

49.title: Episode #1.49
49.plot: Isha gets into an argument with Sahir. Gia, unaware of his allergy, accidentally gives biriyani to Azhar with nuts in it. Meanwhile, Guru tells Revati to apologize to Isha and she tries to make it up to Isha by making her breakfast.

50.title: Episode #1.50
50.plot: Revati makes breakfast in hopes of Isha and Gia sit together to and patch things up. But then Gia tells Revati that she's really hurt because of Isha's remarks. Later, Isha gets emotional when people compare her to Shreya.

51.title: Episode #1.51
51.plot: Isha is taunted by UC as Revati is late on the set again. Elsewhere, Diana grooms Gia for a party as she is apparently the public face of the newspaper. Then, Sahir meets Isha to console her and she finds solace in him.

52.title: Episode #1.52
52.plot: Isha and Gia finally resolve their differences. Sahir secretly blames himself for Isha's troubles and comes up with a game plan. At work, Radhika Apte arrives to promote her upcoming film Phobia and appreciates Isha for her work.

53.title: Episode #1.53
53.plot: Azhar discusses the reason behind his persuasion to take Gia to the party. Meanwhile, Guru gets in a dilemma when Revati asks him to stay at the house. The next day, the girls go shopping to find Gia the perfect dress for the party.

54.title: Episode #1.54
54.plot: Gia gets anxious on the way to the party as she's worried about people's attitude towards her. Later, she meets Azhar's ex, which leads to an uneasy conversation. Meanwhile, Sahir tries to express his gratitude for everything Isha has done for him.

55.title: Episode #1.55
55.plot: Gia has a misunderstanding with Azhar and the latter arrives at her place to settle the issue. Meanwhile, Isha is pumped and surprised, as Sahir introduces her to the underground hip hop culture.

56.title: Episode #1.56
56.plot: The trio get an early morning shock when their landlord announces an increase in rent. They start bickering while finding a way to lower their expenses, but are in for a pleasant surprise. Meanwhile, Isha sees Sahir in a whole new light.

57.title: Episode #1.57
57.plot: After a heavy round of drinking, Revati opens up to Guru and the two end up spending the night together locked inside a room. Meanwhile, Gia goes to meet Azhar and tells him to forget about her.

58.title: Episode #1.58
58.plot: Revati is confused about her feelings for Guru and seeks Gia and Isha's help. Meanwhile, Guru arrives and proposes to Revati. Isha's new dance show gets the green signal from the producers, however, they ask her to make Sahir a contestant on the show.

59.title: Episode #1.59
59.plot: Isha and Gia try to calm Revati down and ask her to be patient with Guru. Later, Sahir tries to boost Isha's confidence and gives her a few tips for her farewell speech.

60.title: Episode #1.60
60.plot: Isha manages to keep her job and the office celebrates her achievement. Later, Guru moves into Sahir's apartment and the guys go out for a night of fun. However, little do they know that the girls are out as well.

61.title: Episode #1.61
61.plot: The girls end up running into the boys and challenge each other. A happening party begins where Isha and her gang try to outdo Sahir and the boys and have more fun than the other group.

62.title: Episode #1.62
62.plot: Sahir and Guru decide to help Azhar get closer to Gia and according to the new plan, Guru and Azhar move in with Gia and Revati. Isha shifts to Sahir's apartment.

63.title: Episode #1.63
63.plot: Revati doesn't recognise Azhar who is sitting in the kitchen. She gets agitated and tries to hit him but Gia stops her making her realise the fact. Later, Gia misunderstands Azhar when she finds a cheap article written about them in the newspaper.

64.title: Episode #1.64
64.plot: Gia learns that Azhar's been chosen as the ambassador for a condom brand and will be shooting an advertisement with a Russian model. Confused about her feelings for Azhar she seeks advice from the girls who make a terrific plan.

65.title: Episode #1.65
65.plot: Gia apologises to Azhar for spying on him, but he demands an end to their relationship. Diana forces her to publicise her break up for a spicy gossip and she helplessly agrees. Meanwhile, the girls try to patch them up and stop Azhar from leaving.

66.title: Episode #1.66
66.plot: Azhar and Gia figure out a way to reconcile their relationship, moreover, the newspaper article fails to dislodge their trust in each other. Gia leaves Diana with almost no choice when she hands her a resignation letter boldly.

67.title: Episode #1.67
67.plot: Sahir and Isha discuss their relationship status with their friends. They decide to host a get-together for all. However, when they are about to leave from work, the lift breaks down, drawing them closer.

68.title: Episode #1.68
68.plot: As the girls and the boys get together for some fun and games, Revati learns from Sahir that Guru lost his virginity to her. Later, Revati initiates a game that might make Guru cough up the truth.

69.title: Episode #1.69
69.plot: Azhar asks Gia to teach him cooking and the two spend some romantic time together. Meanwhile, Revati confesses that she's never slept with a virgin, leaving Guru embarrassed. Later, Isha seduces Sahir and they clear their misunderstandings.

70.title: Episode #1.70
70.plot: Confused about where all three stand in their relationships, Isha, Gia and Revati decide to do a litmus test on the guys and find out what they really want to know. Isha begins to agree with Sahir, who suspects something fishy.

71.title: Episode #1.71
71.plot: When Isha arrives at Sahir's doorstep all dressed up, the atmosphere is romantic. However, Sahir remembers the promise he gave her and asks her to leave before they do something they regret. Later, the boy are invited for a movie by the girls.

72.title: Episode #1.72
72.plot: Guru, Sahir and Azhar visit the girls and plan to stick to their 'morals', however, Tapasya, a friend of Guru, adds fuel to the fire by her presence leading to the girls being jealous. Sahir gets into trouble when he mistakes Isha for Tapasya.

73.title: Episode #1.73
73.plot: Sahir receives a suprise visit from Isha, who reveals the flaws in their relationship. She tells Sahir that she wants to break up, due to compatibility issues between them. Elsewhere, it's a rainy night and Gia proposes to Azhar, who too reciprocates his love.

74.title: Episode #1.74
74.plot: Sahir desperately tries to clear all misunderstandings with Isha, but she refuses to listen. Gia throws a party to celebrate her relationship with Azhar. Guru and Tapasya are spotted together at the party. Later, Isha's dad shows up.

75.title: Episode #1.75
75.plot: Isha's father is displeased with her lifestyle and her work. He gives her an ultimatum, telling her to return with him if she does not get a promotion in 4 months. Elsewhere, Gia is blasted by her boss and is given a challenge.

76.title: Episode #1.76
76.plot: Isha thrashes a celebrity after he is caught trying to get physical with Shreya. The scene causes an uproar and Isha has to be taken away while the incident is taped on many mobile phones. Elsewhere, Gia becomes the boss of her office for one day.

77.title: Episode #1.77
77.plot: Isha's bosses are upset over her reaction to Shivraj, the celebrity's alleged molestation attempt. They order her to apologise but she justifies her act.

78.title: Episode #1.78
78.plot: After Isha decides to quit her job, all her crew members take a stand and plan to quit the project as well. With the bosses now facing a tough decision, it is a make or break situation for Isha.

79.title: Episode #1.79
79.plot: After his performance, Sahir surprises Isha with a short speech, professing his love and proposing to her. But when Isha walks off instantly, everyone is left shocked. Later, Gia and Azhar come together to help Revati and Guru come closer.

80.title: Episode #1.80
80.plot: Revati's ex-boyfriend, Shekhar, has made a surprising re-entry in her life, leaving Gia and Isha worried. The two want her to be with Guru, but they cannot help but be impressed by Shekhar.

81.title: Episode #1.81
81.plot: Gia and Revati continue to be against Shekhar despite Azhar and Sahir's disagreement. Eventually, Isha is fed up of her dysfunctional relationship and decides to apologise to Sahir, and get back to him.

82.title: Episode #1.82
82.plot: Isha's confession does not convince Sahir and he asks her to move in with him. Isha must now decide and make a choice between friendship and love. But Sahir goes missing after having to listen to Revati's harsh words.

83.title: Episode #1.83
83.plot: Isha's anxiety grows as Sahir refuses to show up. However, when Guru sends Isha to Sahir, their relationship takes a turn for the worse as Isha decides not to move in with him. Sahir backs away and warns her to never approach him again.

84.title: Episode #1.84
84.plot: Despite Sahir and Isha's breakup, the gang comes together to find a solution to Revati's obsession with Shekhar. Azhar and Sahir agree to help while Isha is saddened by Sahir's cold demeanour. Later, Azhar and Gia kiss and make up.

85.title: Episode #1.85
85.plot: Sahir and Azhar initiate plans to end Revati's obsession with Shekhar, and invite him for a party. However, things turn awry when Revati and Guru squabble after she is insulted by Shekhar.

86.title: Episode #1.86
86.plot: The three girls get a final warning from their parents to return home. While Revati is disappointed as her contract has ended leaving her jobless, Gia's mother asks her to stay away from Azhar, and Isha's dad gives her a dressing down.

87.title: Episode #1.87
87.plot: Azhar plans a weekend trip to his farmhouse with the entire gang. Isha watches Sahir while Revati has her eyes set on Guru. Excitement beams as they decide to launch their own production company. Later, Gia tries to unearth the details about Azhar's past.

88.title: Episode #1.88
88.plot: Gia's insecurity about Azhar's past forces her to go back to Azhar's farmhouse. Gia restrains Azhar's wish to get intimate stating that she is not ready for the big leap yet. Meanwhile, Isha learns about Sahir's frustration regarding a song composition.

89.title: Episode #1.89
89.plot: Isha feels that Sahir has moved on, when she sees him playing in Tapasya's band. Earlier, Revati is shocked as her parents give her an ultimatum, but Shekhar asks her to fly to New York and join his company. Later, Gia is in for a surprise at Azhar's farmhouse.

90.title: Episode #1.90
90.plot: Isha is in a dilemma, as she has to choose between her career opportunity in Delhi and her friends in Mumbai. What will she choose? Unhappy with Sahir's advise, Isha gets into an ugly fight with him. Elsewhere, Gia is infuriated after Azhar hesitates to tell his mom about her.

91.title: Episode #1.91
91.plot: Sahir, unaware of Isha's decision, gets intoxicated in a club and gets into an altercation with a bartender and bouncer, eventually getting beaten up and injured. Earlier, Isha reveals that she is not shifting her base to Delhi, much to the delight of Gia and Revati. Elsewhere, Gia and Azhar's relationship hits a roadblock until Azhar affirms his commitment and convinces his mom to accept Gia.

92.title: Episode #1.92
92.plot: Mitali astonishes everyone with her breathtaking performance during the auditions, however, her joy is short-lived as UC rejects her for being a bar dancer. While Sahir opposes UC's unreasonable decision, Gia seeks Diana's help to get justice for Mitali.

93.title: Episode #1.93
93.plot: Isha is pumped when she gets news that she is the new creative director of the show, but her excitement dampens when she sees Sahir and Tapasya's electric chemistry while practicing a dance routine. Elsewhere, Gia has the jitters as she prepares to meet Azhar's industrialist mother.

94.title: Episode #1.94
94.plot: A jealous Isha needlessly scrutinises Sahir about his role in the team after seeing him with Tapasya. Elsewhere, Gia is miserable after Azhar's mother disapproves of their relationship. While Revati leaves for a gig in Bangalore, Azhar visits the house and vows to fight for Gia and his relationship regardless of their differences.

95.title: Episode #1.95
95.plot: Isha tries to comprehend her true feelings for Sahir while he drops her back home, but she ends up being rather formal with him after seeing him help Tapasya. Later, Isha is taken aback when Mitali's brother threatens her with a knife and asks her to leave Mitali alone. However, in the nick of time, Sahir and Azhar come to Isha's rescue.

96.title: Episode #1.96
96.plot: Isha's jealousy watching Sahir's intimate dance moves with Tapasya soon turns into anger as she lashes out at both, Sahir and Tapasya, for putting on a performance below par and not matching it with their group theme. An agitated Tapasya threatens to quit the show seeing Isha's dictative avatar. Elsewhere, Gia has mixed emotions regarding Azhar after Azhar reveals he is not returning back to his home.

97.title: Episode #1.97
97.plot: Isha's problems at her workplace intensify, when the police arrive to interrogate her about the forceful involvement of Mitali in her dance show. To make matters worse for Isha, Tapasya decides to resign due to an earlier dispute. Elsewhere, the feud between Gia and Azhar's mom is at all time high as the latter openly confesses her hatred for Gia.

98.title: Episode #1.98
98.plot: Isha is devastated after the police lock her up on false charges of kidnapping Mitali. The efforts of Sahir, Mitali and the rest go in vain when the police refuse to acknowledge Mitali's identity and even discard her statement. However, amidst this dark cloud, Sahir's deep concern and relentless effort to stay with Isha in her hour of need turns out to be the only ray of hope for Isha. Later, the police put Sahir behind the bars for creating an unnecessary ruckus.

99.title: Episode #1.99
99.plot: Despite sharing adjacent cells in the police station, Sahir and Isha's egos keep clashing and they continue to ignore each other. The next day, Isha gets released after Mitali brings a valid identity proof to the police, but much to Isha's dismay, Sahir remains in the lock up. Soon, the problems pile up for the girls as the landlord asks them to evacuate the house immediately.

100.title: Episode #1.100
100.plot: Sahir is released from jail after Tapasya's intervention. She threatens the officer in charge with dire consequences for locking up Sahir, without filing an F.I.R. Elsewhere, Azhar's mom isn't happy on learning that Azhar wishes to accommodate the girls into his house, until they find a new home. Though reluctant at first, Azhar's mom gives in to his request, as she sees this as an opportunity to get even with Gia.

101.title: Episode #1.101
101.plot: Isha's boss is unhappy with her professional attitude and suggests an election for choosing a new creative director for the dance reality show. Isha's hopes seems to be hanging on a thread after she finds out that Tapasya's vote will determine the winner between her and UC. While casting the vote, Tapasya seems to have a throwback of their previous altercations.

102.title: Episode #1.102
102.plot: Gia is delighted to be covering Azhar as the chief guest during the whole 'Dahi Handi' ceremony for her channel, 'Mumbai Masala'. Sahir gets severely injured while doing the 'Dahi Handi' ritual at his office. Earlier, Isha retains her post as the creative director of the dance reality show, all thanks to Tapasya's vote. However, her happiness is short-lived when Tapasya taunts her about her professional life being affected due to Sahir.

103.title: Episode #1.103
103.plot: Azhar's mom gives Gia an ultimatum to find a new home as soon as possible. Gia retaliates back after she finds out that Azhar's mom was responsible for Mitali leaving the city. Earlier, Azhar's mom blames Gia for the 'Dahi Handi' ceremony accident which results in huge monetary losses for Azhar, as he has to postpone his professional commitments. Elsewhere, Tapasya gives subtle hints to Sahir about her growing attraction towards him.

104.title: Episode #1.104
104.plot: Azhar is furious after he sees Gia raise her voice at his mom. Gia gets upset and immediately requests Sahir, to accommodate Isha and her at his place. Meanwhile, Isha is fed up with the work pressure and UC's constant comments about Tapasya and Sahir's intimacy. With a heavy heart, Isha decides to reach out to Sahir and suggest that they should move on with their lives, thereby hinting him about his growing fondness for Tapasya.

105.title: Episode #1.105
105.plot: Sahir tries hard to clear the misunderstanding creeping in Isha's mind with regards to his relationship with Tapasya but Isha chooses to avoid him. When his attempts go in vain, Sahir gets frustrated and leaves. Elsewhere, Azhar's mom accidentally gets to know about Gia's surprise celebration plans for Azhar.

106.title: Episode #1.106
106.plot: Gia tells Isha that she wants to take her relationship to the next level with Azhar on their anniversary night, while Azhar takes tips from Sahir to make the night special. Shekhar plans to help Isha with the funds for her start-up, provided she convinces Revati to go to the U.S. Later, Azhar and Gia's anniversary night loses its steam when Azhar gets some bad news about his mom.

107.title: Episode #1.107
107.plot: Gia suspects Azhar's mom to have faked her illness, so she confronts Nadia seeking answers. Earlier, Azhar rushes to the hospital after Nadia informs him of his mom's sudden chest pain. Gia is upset over Azhar's sudden disappearance between their anniversary celebration, but later gets to know the reason behind it. Elsewhere, Tapasya asks Sahir out for a casual coffee date. Isha's jealousy has no bounds, when Sahir accepts the invitation.

108.title: Episode #1.108
108.plot: While having a casual interaction, Tapasya admits to Azhar about her feelings for Sahir and also reveals her plans of proposing to Sahir on her birthday. Isha seems disturbed after secretly listening to the conversation. Earlier, much to the delight of Isha, Azhar offers his out house to Gia and her to stay for the time being. Gia, on the other hand, is sure that Azhar's mom was faking her illness after Nadia informs her that she saw Azhar's mom walking without the support of a wheel chair.

109.title: Episode #1.109
109.plot: On Eid, Gia decides to surprise Azhar by organising a get-together at his house. During lunch, Azhar's mom goes in search of the missing couple and much to her dismay, finds Gia hidden inside Azhar's cupboard. Displeased with Azhar for ruining her Eid, Azhar's mom gives an ultimatum to Azhar to stay away from Gia. Elsewhere, Isha denies Tapasya's birthday invitation in order to avoid Tapasya's proposal scenario to Sahir.

110.title: Episode #1.110
110.plot: Sahir, Gia, Azhar and Isha attend Tapasya's grand birthday party. Isha, who is aware of Tapasya's surprise, attends the party but decides to get heavily drunk in order to shift her focus from the upcoming proposal scenario. Tapasya takes Guru's help and schedules a private meeting with Sahir in order to express her love.

111.title: Episode #1.111
111.plot: Tapasya's sudden proposal leaves Sahir feeling awkward. He acts as a pure gentleman and politely tells her that he is not ready for a serious relationship. Tapasya understands and accepts Sahir's decision and they decide to remain friends forever. Gia and Isha are over the moon after Revati comes back from Bangalore. However, their happiness seems short-lived after Revati reveals that she will ne shifting to U.S.A.

112.title: Episode #1.112
112.plot: Nadia immediately informs Gia when she comes across some letters and suspects that Azhar's mom had something to do with Azhar's dad's death. Earlier, Azhar's mom threatens Nadia to maintain distance from Gia, or face severe consequences. Elsewhere, Revati is unable to catch up with the changes that have occurred in Gia and Isha's personal life.

113.title: Episode #1.113
113.plot: Although Sahir has rejected Tapasya's proposal, Isha is adamant to get Sahir and Tapasya together. She plans her next move with Tapasya's help. She starts by organising a 'Puja' at their house, much to Sahir's shock. Later, Azhar's mom is furious on Azhar and accuses him of breaching their religious customs, after he attends the 'Puja' arranged by Gia and others.

114.title: Episode #1.114
114.plot: Sahir accidentally finds out that Isha has been acting as a cupid for Tapasya in her attempts to win his heart. After a steamy dance session with Tapasya, Sahir decides to teach Isha a lesson, by intentionally confessing his love to Tapasya. A shocked and jealous Isha watches their romance from a distance. Elsewhere, Gia breaks into Azhar's house to collect evidence against Azhar's mom.

115.title: Episode #1.115
115.plot: At the dinner table, Azhar's mom is furious and shocked when Gia reveals the letters she had found earlier. She also challenges to expose Azhar's mom and prove that the latter is guilty for murdering Azhar's dad. Elsewhere, Sahir, in the presence of Isha, gifts a beautiful red dress to Tapasya and invites her for a romantic date at his house.

116.title: Episode #1.116
116.plot: Revati's boyfriend Shekhar, mocks Guru for being a small town guy and labels him a loser in every aspect of his life. A humiliated Guru chooses to stay silent, but the situation gets out of hand when Guru slaps Shekhar after he talks inappropriately about Revati. Earlier, Sahir forces Isha to watch and approve one of his intimating dance videos he made with Tapasya. Isha understands that Sahir is trying to make her jealous, but stays defiant by revealing that she has moved on.

117.title: Episode #1.117
117.plot: Gia's honest opinion and comments about Azhar's upcoming movie, results in a severe confrontation between Azhar and her. A furious Azhar questions her about her commitment and accuses her of giving priority to her profession over him. Later, Azhar feels left out after Gia and others start a meeting for their new start-up plan without him. Matters get out of hand, when a few journalists question Gia about her comments on Azhar's upcoming movie in his presence.

118.title: Episode #1.118
118.plot: Sahir officially announces that he is in a relationship with Tapasya, much to the shock of Isha. Later on, Gia somehow figures out that Sahir actually does not love Tapasya and is just faking it in order to make Isha jealous. Soon, Gia convinces Isha to propose to Sahir once again. Will Sahir accept Isha's proposal? Elsewhere, Revati announces that she has officially broken up with Shekhar.

119.title: Episode #1.119
119.plot: Tapasya is surprised to see Sahir bestow his love on her. He invites Tapasya home and even allows her to stay for the night. Meanwhile, Revati lashes out at Guru for suprising her with gifts and cake for no good reason. On finding that Azhar's mom is out of the house, Gia breaks into Azhar's house secretly in order to search for some concrete evidence against her.

120.title: Episode #1.120
120.plot: After Tapasya announces that she is going to Delhi with Sahir for an indefinite time, Isha gathers all the courage and confesses her love to Sahir. Sahir is shocked and stands speechless. On the other hand, Guru, takes all by surprise after he announces that he is leaving Mumbai for good. Elsewhere, Azhar breaks up with Gia after the latter accuses his mom of being involved in a conspiracy of killing his father.

imdb.title: MTV Girls on Top
plot: _MTV Girls on Top_ (qv) showcase about the issues, women face in the country. The three girls in the show will try to deal with job issues, love issues and also domestic issues.::Dibyayan Chakravorty
